mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(product.`order_sub_no`) AS orderSubNo, mo.`pay_type` AS payType, mo.`pay_status` AS subPayStatus, mo.`resource` AS resource, mo.`create_time` as createTime, mo.`pay_time` as payTime, mo.order_no as orderNo, logistics.`consignee_name`, logistics.`consignee_mobile`, mo.`name`, mo.`mobile`, mo.`resource` FROM m_order_product product, m_order mo ,m_logistics logistics WHERE product.`order_no` = mo.`order_no` AND product.`order_no` = logistics.`order_no` and product.order_sub_no = #{orderSubNo}
